definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: kiln, for lime or pottery (so Ki, AW; Mishn:Kel viii. 9; √ and original mng. dub.; acc. to Thes as subduing, reducing its contents, cf. igne ferrum domatur Plin:Nat. Hist. 36. 27)—alw. abs.; only in ´[[קִיטוֹר הַכּ]] Ge 19:28 (J; sim. of smoke of [[כִּכָּר]], Sodom and Gom.); ´[[עֶשֶׁן הַכּ]] Ex 19:18 (E; sim. of smoke of Sinai); ´[[פִּיחַ כ]] ashes of kiln Ex 9:8, cf. v:Ex 9:10 (both P).
